resources.string: Scan a product\'s barcode to list its online prices.
Could not find any data for this product. Please try another product.

Upon scanning your product’s barcode, this app will show the prices for this product from Amazon, Ebay and Walmart. \n\nWith this, you can determine whether the price you’re currently paying for is fair or not.
Scan your product\'s barcode to see if you\'re being charged overpriced NOW!
